## CommandKitEventDispatch

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/plugins/types.ts" sourceLine="17" packageName="commandkit" />

Represents an event dispatched to the plugins.

```ts title="Signature"
interface CommandKitEventDispatch {
    name: string;
    args: unknown[];
    namespace: string | null;
    once: boolean;
    metadata: ParsedEvent;
    accept(): void;
}
```

<div className="members-wrapper">

### name

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string`}   />

The name of the event.
### args

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`unknown[]`}   />

The arguments passed to the event.
### namespace

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string | null`}   />

The namespace of the event, if any.
### once

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`boolean`}   />

If this event runs only once, it will be set to true.
### metadata

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`<a href='/docs/next/api-reference/commandkit/interfaces/parsed-event#parsedevent'>ParsedEvent</a>`}   />

The additional metadata associated with the event.
### accept

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`() => void`}   />

Captures the owner of the event, preventing other plugins from handling it.


</div>
